column4: my Ubuntu freezes. I think it is flash. I'd like to remove flash. I've been asking about my freezing for over a week on and off.
is this only happening when viewing flash?

I dont know. It happens. there are a lot of tabs open usually. I am NOT watching flash at that time. Nor is any specifically youtube tab open. I am trying to avoid it. I'd like to disable flash but I just changed my default browser from chrome ot firlfox in case it is chrome.
mm  which video card do you have?
